<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/me/player/queue"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the list of objects that make up the user's queue.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-read-currently-playing**, **user-read-playback-state**

  parameters={undefined}
